2.0.0.name: wordpress/external-links-to-new-window
2.0.0.description:
The external link plugin for WordPress will allow site admins to automatically open external site links to a new window with options for an icon and nofollow rules.

This plugin is maintained by Christopher Ross, http://thisismyurl.com or you can find him on Twitter at http://twitter.com/thisismyurl/
